description.value:
A monk with this ki power gains the ability to assume an ethereal state for 1 minute as though using the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.gw9bes9othfqm7mi]{Etherealness}, using his monk level as his caster level.

Using this ability is a move action that consumes 3 points from the monkâ€™s ki pool.

This ability affects only the monk and cannot be used to make other creatures ethereal.
